data.description:
Farmers Insurance is seeking curious, passionate, and hard-working students for their paid summer internship program. As a Data Science Intern, you will work on real-world projects using machine learning and predictive models to solve business problems, while gaining valuable skills through hands-on experience and exposure to leadership teams.


Responsibilities

  • Under direction, use appropriate modeling techniques to address business needs
  • Broaden knowledge and application of modeling techniques and procedures
  • Support preparation of internal/external, structured/unstructured data sets to build/rebuild/refresh predictive models
  • Clearly communicates complex technical concepts and data insights to non-technical stakeholders
  • Performs other duties as assigned

Skills

  • Currently pursuing a Bachelors (BS/BA) or Masters (MS/MA) degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Data Analytics or Computer Science
  • You must be a student enrolled in an accredited college during the duration of the internship
  • Specifically, a rising Junior or Senior level undergraduate student or graduate student
  • Ability to manipulate and analyze data to address and solve business problems
  • Familiarity with Python or similar languages for machine learning
  • A passion for learning and development
  • Willingness to independently learn and make an impact within a team environment
  • Self-motivated, an excellent problem solver and a quick learner
  • Good verbal and written communication skills
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite

Benefits

  • Paid Time Off

Company Overview

  • The companies comprising the Farmers Insurance Group of CompaniesÂ® currently make up one of the country's largest insurers of vehicles, homes and small businesses, and provide a wide range of other specialty insurance and financial services products. It was founded in 1928, and is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA, with a workforce of 10001+ employees. Its website is https://www.farmers.com.

    • Company H1B Sponsorship

  • Farmers Insurance has a track record of offering H1B sponsorships, with 105 in 2025, 76 in 2024, 86 in 2023, 129 in 2022, 106 in 2021, 90 in 2020. Please note that this does not guarantee sponsorship for this specific role.
